cividis.info: Like [viridis](/catalog/sequential/viridis), cividis is perceptually uniform and colorblind friendly. However, cividis also goes a step further: not only is it usable by colorblind users, it should actually look effectively identical to colorblind and non-colorblind users. For more details, see [Nuñez J, *et al* (2018)](https://doi.org/10.1371/journal.pone.0199239).
